backend/main.mo: Main actor implementing a streaming platform with channels, chat rooms, Bacon Cash payments, AI conversations, user profiles, and access control; includes blob storage and authorization mixins with migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms OldChannel records to NewChannel records by adding a chatRoomId field, preserving all other actor state during upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting implemented features including StreamChatPanel, TipDialog, payment history hooks, and their associated test IDs and component dependencies.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components, pages, and hooks including chat, payment, authentication, channel management, and UI utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color system defining light and dark theme variables for the RockHog TV application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the RockHog TV React application with root div and module script reference.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for browse, categories, streams, creator studio, admin, contact, sign-up, AI chat, chat room, and payment history pages.
frontend/src/components/account/AccountS: Header widget displaying authenticated user's name, Bacon Cash balance, and a Buy button linking to the purchase page.
Route guard component that restricts access to admin-only pages by checking authentication and admin role status.
frontend/src/components/adult/AdultGateD: Modal dialog requiring age confirmation (18+) before allowing access to adult content with warning message and confirm/cancel actions.
frontend/src/components/adult/AdultRoute: A route guard component that displays an age verification dialog for adult content and redirects users who decline consent back to the home page.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access denied screen with a shield icon, customizable message, and a button to return to the home page.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: A button component that handles Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and error handling, clearing the query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: A modal dialog for new users to create their profile by entering a display name, initializing their Bacon Cash balance and best score to zero.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleGate.ts: A permission gate component that conditionally renders children based on admin status or channel ownership, hiding content when authorization fails.
frontend/src/components/branding/BrandLo: Displays the RockHog TV logo and brand name as a clickable button that navigates to the home page.
frontend/src/components/branding/Categor: Renders category-specific icons from a predefined map of category names to image paths, falling back to the music icon if not found.
frontend/src/components/branding/HeroBan: Displays a hero banner with a background image and overlay text promoting RockHog TV as a streaming platform for various content types.
frontend/src/components/channels/Channel: A card component displaying channel thumbnail, title, category badge, and description with hover effects and navigation to the stream page on click.
A dialog form for creating or editing channels with fields for title, category, description, stream URL, and thumbnail upload, handling both create and update mutations.
Displays a responsive grid of channel cards with loading and empty states, supporting customizable empty messages.
frontend/src/components/channels/Thumbna: Handles thumbnail image upload with progress tracking, preview display, and removal functionality using ExternalBlob for file handling.
frontend/src/components/channels/TipDial: A dialog for sending Bacon Cash tips to channel owners, displaying user balance, validating tip amounts, and allowing optional messages with character limits.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatInput.t: A textarea-based chat input component with send button that handles Enter key submission and Shift+Enter for new lines.
frontend/src/components/chat/ChatRoomLis: Displays a scrollable list of available chat rooms fetched via useGetChatRooms hook, with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/chat/Conversatio: Shows a list of AI chat conversations with message previews and selection handling, including empty and loading states.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageBubb: Renders individual chat messages with different styling for AI vs user messages, including avatars with icons.
frontend/src/components/chat/MessageList: Displays chat room messages in a scrollable area with auto-scroll on new messages, timestamps, and sender names.
frontend/src/components/chat/StreamChatP: Main chat panel component that combines MessageList and ChatInput, requiring authentication to send messages.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with header (logo, nav, login), footer (social links, caffeine.ai attribution), and profile setup dialog.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Prima: Primary navigation bar with category buttons (Music, Gaming, Sports, Horror, Adult), AI Chat, Chat Room, and authenticated-only Creator Studio and Earnings links.
frontend/src/components/player/StreamEmb: Embeds video streams from URLs or embed codes, with special handling for YouTube and Twitch URLs.
frontend/src/components/share/ShareButto: Share button that uses Web Share API when available, otherwise falls back to copying URL to clipboard.

frontend/src/game/baconOps/engine/consta: Empty file for BaconOps game constants.

frontend/src/game/baconOps/engine/gameSt: Empty file for BaconOps game state management.

Empty file for BaconOps game type definitions.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/input/useDesk: Empty file for BaconOps desktop keyboard/mouse controls hook.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/input/useTouc: Empty file for BaconOps touch controls hook.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/input/Virtual: Empty file for BaconOps virtual/touch controls component.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/ui/BaconOpsMa: Empty file for BaconOps main menu UI component.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/ui/Hud.tsx: Empty file for BaconOps heads-up display component.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/ui/RoundOverl: Empty file for BaconOps round start/end overlay component.
frontend/src/game/baconOps/ui/StatsPanel: Empty file for BaconOps statistics panel component.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Manages the backend actor instance using React Query, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and initializing access control with an admin token from URL parameters.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdultGate.ts: Provides adult content consent management using sessionStorage, with methods to grant, revoke, and check consent status.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthz.ts: Provides authorization hooks to query the caller's user role and admin status from the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useChatRooms.ts: Manages chat room operations including fetching all rooms, retrieving messages with 2.5-second polling, and posting new messages with automatic query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useConversations.ts: Provides hooks for fetching, retrieving individual conversations, and storing AI chat conversations with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider with login, logout, identity management, and configurable AuthClient options including derivation origin support.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides comprehensive React Query hooks for channels (CRUD operations), user profiles, Bacon Cash requests, streamer payments, and batch queries for multiple user profiles.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, including specialized color schemes for bacon-ops, AI chat, and chat room components with streaming gradients.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query client and Internet Identity provider, then renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBaconCashRequest: Admin page for viewing and fulfilling user Bacon Cash purchase requests. Displays a table of all requests with their status and provides a fulfill button for pending requests.
frontend/src/pages/AIChatPage.tsx: Implements an AI chat interface with conversation management, rule-based response generation for RockHog TV topics, message history, and sidebar navigation for switching between conversations.
frontend/src/pages/BrowseHomePage.tsx: Main browse page displaying a hero banner, category grid for navigation, and recently added channels. Users can click categories to navigate to category-specific pages.
frontend/src/pages/BuyBaconCashPage.tsx: User-facing page for requesting Bacon Cash purchases. Shows current balance, a form to submit purchase requests, and a list of the user's previous requests with their status.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Displays channels filtered by category with category icon and count. Wraps adult category content in AdultRouteGuard for age verification.
frontend/src/pages/ChatRoomPage.tsx: Live chat room interface with sidebar for room selection and main area for messages and input. Requires authentication and user profile to participate.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Simple contact page displaying the owner's email address with a mailto link button.
frontend/src/pages/CreatorStudioPage.tsx: Creator dashboard for managing channels with create, edit, and delete functionality. Displays channel details with copy-to-clipboard buttons for IDs and stream keys.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentHistoryPage.ts: Displays a tabbed interface showing received and sent payment tips with formatted timestamps and amounts, requiring Internet Identity authentication to view transaction history.
frontend/src/pages/SignUpPage.tsx: Sign-up page that uses Internet Identity for authentication, displays feature cards about secure authentication and personalized profiles, and redirects authenticated users to home.
frontend/src/pages/StreamDetailPage.tsx: Stream detail page with embedded player, chat panel, channel info, and admin/owner controls for editing, deleting, and tipping channels, wrapped in adult content guard.
frontend/src/utils/category.ts: Defines streaming category types and provides utility functions to map category values to display labels (Music, Gaming, Sports, Horror, Adult, etc.).
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for extracting URL parameters from both regular query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence and cleanup capabilities.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system, extended theme for UI components (sidebar, chart, card colors), container settings, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Project state file tracking RockHog TV streaming platform features including channel management, content categories (Music/Gaming/Sports/Horror/Adult), Bacon Cash virtual currency, Internet Identity authentication, and tipping functionality. Contains 12 implemented features with architectural notes specifying the public share URL as rockhogtv.caffeine.xyz.
